title.value: Эффективность использования пробиотического препарата 'Споробакт' при выращивании свиней
Use efficiency of probiotic preparation 'Sporobakt' at pigs cultivation
Use efficiency of probiotic preparation 'Sporobakt' at pigs cultivation

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Dubinich, M.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus at a swine farm 'Meshetniki' OS 'Cherlena' in Mostovskij region of the Grodno area there were presented the results of studies on weaning pigs with the purpose to determine a doze of application of a preparation 'Sporobakt' in structure of forages and to estimate efficiency of its use at rearing of pigs. Results of researches have shown, that the optimal dosage probiotic preparation 'Sporobact' in diets of pigs was the dosage of 1,5 kg on 1 ton of mixed fodder (activity near 10E10 bacteria/g). Use of a sporous probiotic assists in the given dosage promoting to activization of albuminous, carbohydrate, mineral exchanges, the best mastering of forage nutrients, decrease in expenses of a forage on 1 kg of a gain of alive weight, to decrease in conversion of a forage and as consequence to increase of animals efficiency on 8,5%.
